title: PMS 2.0 625 - Deshaun Watson's Introductory Press Conference In Cleveland, Sweet 16 Day 2 Preview, Ian Rapoport, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, AJ Hawk, and the boys chat about the news that Deshaun Watson was not indicted by a grand jury and officially had his introductory press conference as a Cleveland Brown, where some other potential free agents might wind up going, the Sweet Sixteen games last night and tonight's boost on the Saint Peter's Peacocks to score 60+ points, exclusively on FanDuel. Joining the program to chat more about Deshaun Watson's situation, where some marquee free agents might be going, if this is one of the deepest wide receiver drafts in years, where Baker Mayfield might be playing Quarterback next year, the Jarvis Landy and Julio Jones situations, and more (17:46-51:17). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to watch the show and listen on Sirius XM Channel 82, Mad Dog Radio. We appreciate the hell out of all you. See you tomorrow, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
